unnormalised: Builders in Chandigarh are reportedly facing a tough time understanding the new construction guidelines. Apparently, the approved map says the kitchen should be exactly 10 sq m, not 9.9 or even 10.1! One builder, Mr. Sharma, joked he needed a laser to measure that accurately. He added, "Earlier, a rough estimate in sq ft was good enough. Now, it's all about the perfect meter!"
